statements: DELETE FROM game_events WHERE event_date < '2022-01-01' AND notification_sent = FALSE;
DELETE FROM game_events WHERE event_id = 1 AND game_id = 101;
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE player_id = 25 AND notification_type = 'alert';
DELETE FROM Notifications WHERE is_read = TRUE;
DELETE FROM GameEvents WHERE event_id = 100 AND event_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Notifications WHERE player_id = 50 AND message LIKE 'New Game%';
DELETE FROM Player WHERE player_name = 'John Doe';
